Title: Blood Relations
Plot: A serial killer from the past begins to possess people so he can kill again. Allison races against the clock to save his next victim, but she becomes a target in the process.
GuestStars: James A. Watson Jr., Ryan Judd, Michael Fairman, Michael Shamus Wiles, Christina Pickles, Shanna Collins, Margo Martindale, Christa B. Allen, Mark A. Sheppard, Josie Lopez, Ann Walker, Kerry Finlayson, Ted Garci
